transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji namaskar.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji namaskar.
Customer: Sir main to 8 march ko pehle Rajasthan se bol raha hun Makrana se. Sir Numan baat kar raha hun main.
Executive: Haan Numan ji.
Customer: Achcha main ye bol raha hun ki aapko maine ye note karwaya hai ki white chal raha hai dashboard shanivar ke din aur wohi problem aaj subah se aapse meri 20 10 15 minute baat hui. Subah se subah se ki ye koi baat nahi hui apni.
Customer: Ye subah se koi baat nahi hui maine aapko shanivar ko note karwaya tha aapne bola ki sunday hai kal to kal chodiye monday ko main karta hun. Ki baad mein kal apni baat hui thi isme baat hui.
Customer: Suniye kal subah se aapko teen baar lead are ye kya system
Customer: Sir lead aayegi portal pe tabhi dikhegi na. Sir lead aayegi portal pe tabhi dikhegi na. Us time lead aayi thi maine aapko dikhaya na.
Customer: Ye galat system hai.
Customer: Kya keh rahe hain aap?
Customer: Haan ji
Customer: Awaaz nahi aa rahi aapke. Koi fake fake be fake isme aani to chahiye.
Customer: Chahe fake ho chahe product se related aani to chahiye ekdam right aana chahiye.
Customer: Update chalta rehna chahiye.
Customer: To sir aisa kahin bhi nahi hota hai.
Customer: Sir maine aapko bola bhi mere manager kitni by lead de rahe ho suno ek minute kitni by lead de rahe ho aap?
Executive: 72 ek sapte ki.
Customer: 70 haan ji woh kaise consume karenge hum kis tarike se karenge aapke kehne se karenge.
Executive: Sir subah se aapke kehne se karunga kya main. Aapke kehne se karunga to kaise baat hogi aap bataiye.
Customer: Sir to mere bhai isme by lead nahi dega to kya karunga fir main aise white dashboard pada rahega. Sir aap ek taraf keh rahe hain ki lead nahi aa rahi hai ek taraf keh rahe hain main consume nahi karunga to kaise chalenge aap khud bataiye aap kehna kya chah rahe hain.
Customer: Main bol raha hun white dashboard pada hai iske koi white lead dikh nahi rahi hai. Sir isliye pada hai kyunki jab lead aayegi portal pe aapko dikhegi aap nahi karenge. Kabhi itne salon mein kabhi nahi hua hai. Sir abhi maine aapko dikhaya. Kabhi hua hai kya itne salon ke andar. Sir ek minute meri baat sunenge abhi maine aapko dikhaya designer pedestal sink ki lead aayi thi Bombay Maharashtra se aapne fir bhi maine consume kiya usko. Nahi consume ki wo sold out ho gayi hai. consume kar liya maine. Nahi consume ki aapne sold out ho gayi hai sir. Wo hamare kaam ki nahi kyun karenge usko. Kyun karenge usko. Aap keh rahe hain consume kariye aap keh rahe hain sold out ho gayi aap khud nahi samajh rahe sir aapko bolna kya chah rahe hain. Isko chodiye ye issue hai hi nahi. Main jo baat bol raha hun usme aao na main mudde pe.
Executive: White white dashboard dikha raha hun. Sir wahi main baat bol raha hun designer pedestal sink ki lead aayi thi maine aapko dikhai thi ki nahi dikhai thi us time dikhi thi dashboard pe. Wo mujhe bhi dikh rahi thi wo mujhe bhi dikh rahi thi maine nahi ki consume usko sold out ho gayi to jo lead aayegi wo dikhegi. Suniye aise aise nahi chalega aap kisi senior se baat karo galat baat hai ye. Main kya do teen din se aapke piche laga hun sirf yahi kaam hai kya mera sirf aapko phone hi karta rahunga kya main.
Executive: Sir aap khud nahi samajh rahe hain ki aapko kya problem hai aur kya solution aap jyada hoshiyar bante ho payment lekar ke hain. Galat baat hai na ye aap logon ki.
Executive: Sir koi galat baat nahi hai. Baat karwao meri baat karwao senior se. Haan main baat kara deta hun. Abhi complaint dalunga tumhari bhi.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Customer says dashboard is showing white.

- Customer wants to talk to a senior executive.



Resolution:

- Executive explained leads appear when available on portal.

- Executive offered to connect the customer to a senior.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect customer to a senior.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, dashboard, complaint, senior executive
